ModMetaData.name: Lovin' Is Messy (and fun)
ModMetaData.author: XandrMoro
ModMetaData.description:
Doin lovin is fun and recreational*, but sometimes leaves quite a cleanup to be done.
If you dont have Dubs Hygiene, if will leave some love juice on the bed. If you do, it will also significantly increase hygiene need for participants - you can even oblige them to take a bath afterwards!
*toggleable in settings
